title: 【1.1.0】聪明的动作MOD
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1265775896 于 2012-1-17 09:30 编辑 

此MOD需要PlayerAPI的MOD：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=16405&highlight=player%2Bapi

功能：

Climbing only via gaps in the walls只能通过在墙壁攀登差距Climb ladders with different speeds depending on ladder coverage and/or neighbour blocks与阶梯覆盖和/或邻居块不同的速度爬上梯子Alternative animations for flying and falling飞行和下降的另类动画Climbing along ceilings登山沿天花板Configurable sneaking配置偷渡Alternative swimming替代游泳Alternative diving另类跳水Alternative flying另类飞行Faster sprinting更快的冲刺Side & Back jumps侧面及回跳Charged jumps带电跳跃Head jumps头跳跃Crawling爬行Sliding滑动

特点： 免费登山 


This mod implements an optional mode of free climbing behaviour.这个mod实现自由攀爬行为的可选模式。 When enabled by configuration or by default you can climb everywhere you find at least a block sized horizontal edge.当配置或默认启用的，你到处可以爬上你找到至少一个块大小的水平边缘。 

To climb up you have to move forward toward the edge (default "W") and click and hold the grab button (default "LCONTROL").要爬上你必须向前进向边缘（默认的“W”），单击并按住抢按钮（默认的“LCONTROL”）。 
To climb down click and hold the grab button without moving forward toward the edge.爬下来单击并按住抢按钮，没有走向边缘前进。 
To grab an edge while falling down along a wall, rotate towards the edge in the wall and press the grab button.抢而下降沿墙壁边缘，对在墙上的边缘旋转和按抢“按钮。 If you are still falling slow enough, free climbing will start.如果您仍然下降足够慢，自由攀登将开始。 If you are beyond a certain falling speed when grabbing, damage will be done to you.如果超出了一定的下降速度时，抢夺，伤害会做给你。 

To change this default grab button visit Minecrafts "Options"/"Controls" menu.要更改此默认抢按钮访问Minecrafts“选项”/“控制”菜单。 



Feature: Ladder Climbing 特点： 梯攀登 


This mod implements three additional modes of ladder climbing behaviour.这个mod实现了三个额外的阶梯攀登行为模式。 

Simple Mode: 简单模式： 

Standard climbing on complete ladder coverage完整的标准攀上阶梯覆盖Standard climbing on feet only ladder coverage标准攀上脚只有阶梯覆盖Slow climbing on hands only ladder coverage慢动手只攀登的阶梯覆盖


Smart Mode: 智能模式： 

Standard climbing on complete ladder coverage完整的标准攀上阶梯覆盖Slow climbing on feet only ladder coverage慢脚只有攀登的阶梯覆盖Slow climbing on hands only ladder coverage慢动手只攀登的阶梯覆盖Standard climbing when "holes" in the walls next to the ladder are present (solid block/nonsolid block or half steps) 标准攀登的“洞”，在梯子旁边的墙壁都存在时（固体块/ nonsolid块或半步骤）


Free Mode: 自由模式： 

Ladder climbing is functionally embedded in the feature free climbing .梯攀登功能嵌入在自由攀爬功能。Specific speeds are configurable on top of the free climbing configuration with Smart Mode -inspired default values.具体速度上配置顶级的自由攀登与配置智能模式启发的默认值。


Examples: 例如： 

1) Gapped Ladders 1）跳空梯子 







MC 1.4_01: fast climbing MC 1.4_01：快速攀登 
MC 1.5_01: no climbing MC 1.5_01：没有攀登 
simple: alternating slow/fast climbing简单：慢/快交替攀登 
smart: slow climbing智能：缓慢爬坡 


2) The bottom end of Ladders 2）梯子的底端 

2.1) Ladder starting one block away from ground 2.1）梯开始一个块远离地面 







MC 1.4_01: fast climbing MC 1.4_01：快速攀登 
MC 1.5_01: no climbing, after jump fast climbing MC 1.5_01：没有攀登，快速登山后跳 
simple: slow climbing简单：缓慢爬坡 
smart: fast climbing智能：快速攀登 

2.2) Ladder starting two block away from ground 2.2）梯开始远离地面的两个块 







MC 1.4_01: after jump fast climbing MC 1.4_01：后跳快速攀登 
MC 1.5_01: after jump no climbing MC 1.5_01：后跳，没有登山 
simple: after jump slow climbing简单：后跳缓慢爬坡 
smart: after jump slow climbing智能：后跳缓慢爬坡 

2.3) Ladder starting two block away from ground with support from neighbour blocks 2.3）梯从地面起两个街区之遥，支持来自邻近块 



 .._ .. _ 






 .._ .. _ 


MC 1.4_01: after jump fast climbing MC 1.4_01：后跳快速攀登 
MC 1.5_01: after jump no climbing MC 1.5_01：后跳，没有登山 
simple: after jump slow climbing简单：后跳缓慢爬坡 
smart: after jump fast climbing智能：后跳快速攀登 


3) The top end of Ladders 3）梯子上端 

3.1) Ladder ending one block away from ground 3.1）梯形图结束一个块远离地面 







MC 1.4_01: fast climbing MC 1.4_01：快速攀登 
MC 1.5_01: fast climbing MC 1.5_01：快速攀登 
simple: fast climbing简单，快速攀登 
smart: slow climbing智能：缓慢爬坡 

3.2) Ladder ending one half block away from ground 3.2）梯离地面结束一个半块 







MC 1.4_01: fast climbing MC 1.4_01：快速攀登 
MC 1.5_01: fast climbing MC 1.5_01：快速攀登 
simple: fast climbing简单，快速攀登 
smart: fast climbing智能：快速攀登 

3.3) Ladder ending with support from neighbour blocks 3.3）支持来自邻近块结束的梯子 














 ... ... ... 




MC 1.4_01: fast climbing MC 1.4_01：快速攀登 
MC 1.5_01: fast climbing MC 1.5_01：快速攀登 
simple: fast climbing简单，快速攀登 
smart: fast climbing智能：快速攀登 






Feature: Climbing along ceilings 特点： 攀沿天花板 


This mod allows climbing along ceilings as long as the ceiling block supports it.这个mod允许沿天花板攀登只要天花板块支持。 Currently only the steel fence block and the closed trap door block support ceiling climbing.目前，只有钢护栏块和封闭活门块支持上限攀登。 

To start climbing along ceilings hold the grab button when below, but not too far below, the climbable ceiling.要开始攀沿天花板举行抢 “按钮时，下面，但下面不太远，爬坡的上限。 To stop ceiling climbing simply release the grab button.要停止上限攀登，只需释放抢按钮。 

If wall climbing is also possible when pressing the pressing the grab button, wall climbing will start instead.如果攀岩也可以当按下按下抓取按钮，攀岩将开始代替。 In this case turn into the direction you want to move to start ceiling climbing.在这种情况下变成你想要移动的方向，开始登山上限。 



Feature: Configurable sneaking 功能： 配置偷渡 


This mod allows to configure the standard sneaking via the configuration file.这个mod允许通过配置文件来配置标准偷渡。 The sneaking speed can set and sneaking can be disabled at all.可以设置和所有可以禁用偷偷潜入速度。 

Additionally sneaking can be made togglable .此外偷渡可togglable。 When toggled on it can be toggled off by pressing the sneak button again.当它切换可以切换再次按下潜行按钮。 This also works while swimming or diving.这也适用于游泳或潜水。 



Feature: Alternative Swimming and Diving 特点： 替代游泳跳水 


This mod implements optional alternative swimming and diving behaviours.这个mod实现可选的替代游泳和跳水行为。 

To dive jump into still water that is at least two blocks deep.潜入水至少有两大块深跳。 Then press and hold the forward button to dive.然后按住前进按钮潜水。 To steer use your mouse .引导使用鼠标 。 
To swim stop holding the forward button and press and hold the jump button instead until you reach the surface.游泳停止前进按钮和按住跳跃键，直到您到达表面。 Then press and hold the forward button again to swim.然后按住“ 前进 ”按钮，再游泳。 To steer use your mouse again.引导，再次使用鼠标。 
To dive again stop pressing the jump button and direct your mouse toward the depths.再次下潜，停止按跳跃键，直接向深处你的鼠标。 

When you are walking in one block deep water you can switch to diving by pressing the sneak and then the grab button.当你走在一个块中的深层水可以切换到潜水按潜行， 然后抢按钮。 If you press the jump button before the grab button you will switch to swimming instead.如果按跳跃键前抢按钮，您将开关，而不是游泳。 

When you are swimming or divind in one block deep water you can switch to walking by pressing the grab button.当您在游泳或在一个块中的深层水divind，你可以切换到行走按下抓取按钮。 



Feature: Alternative Flying 特点： 另类飞行 


This mod implements an optional alternative flying behaviour.这个mod实现了一个可选的替代飞行行为。 

It completely replaces standard flying and allows you to fly up and down via looking.它完全取代标准的飞行，并允许您通过寻找飞向上和向下。 The standard flying jump to raise, sneak to fall behaviour has been reimplemented and works similar to its standard flying counterpart. 提高标准的飞行跳跃， 潜行到秋天的行为已重新实现和标准的飞行对口的工作原理类似。 

Alternative flying can be started and ended just like standard flying by double clicking the jump button.另类飞行就可以开始和结束，就像标准的飞行通过双击跳跃键。 



Feature: Charged jumps 特点： 带电跳跃 


This mod implements optional, configurable charged jumps.这个mod实现可选，配置收取的跳跃。 

To start charging press and hold the jump button while sneaking on the spot.开始充电按住跳跃键， 同时偷偷当场。 To jump either release the jump button or stop sneaking.要跳要么释放跳跃键或停止偷渡。 The default maximum charge jump height is two blocks.默认的最高收费跳跃的高度是两大块。 

When you start moving while charging the charge will be lost.当您启动移动充电时，充电都将丢失。 



Feature: Head Jumping 特征： 头跳跃 


This mod implements the possibility to jump head first instead of head up.这个mod实现的可能性，而不是头部先跳头高达。 

To head jump start sprinting and press the grab and the jump button.头跳开始冲刺 ，按抓斗和跳跃键。 When the jump button is released you will jump, head first, with a angle depending on how long you pressed the jump button. 跳跃按钮被释放时，你会跳，头部首先，一个取决于多久，你按下跳跃键的角度。 

Hitting ground while falling with your head first will damage you more than hitting ground with your feet first.击中地面，而你的头下降，首先会损害你比你的脚触及地面第一。 



Feature: Side & Back Jumps 特点： 侧面和背面跳 


This mod implements the possibility to jump to the side or back while straightend on ground.这个mod实现的可能性，而地面上跳straightend侧面或背面。 

To jump left double click the left button, to jump right double click the right button and to jump back double click the back button.跳左双击左边的按钮，跳到右侧双击右边的按钮，跳回双击“后退”按钮。 

You can also jump back-left and back-right by double clicking both relevant buttons at once.双击一次两个相关的按钮，也可以跳后左和后右。 




Feature: Sliding 功能： 滑动 


This mod implements ground sliding.这个mod实现了地面滑动。 

To slide on the ground you have to start sprinting first.在地面上滑动，你必须首先开始冲刺。 Then press the sneak button while pressing the grab button.然后按潜行按钮，同时按下抢按钮。 

Additionally you can start sliding from forward jumping or flying .此外，你就可以开始向前跳跃或飞行滑动。 Just hit the ground while pressing the sneak and the grab button.刚刚砸在地面上，同时按下潜行和抢按钮。 

You will slide as long as the initial horizontal ground hitting speed and the ground spipperiness supports it.您将幻灯片只要初始水平地面的击球速度和地面spipperiness支持。 If the sneak button is still pressed when the sliding stops you start crawling instead.如果潜行按钮仍然是按下滑动停止时开始，而不是爬行 。 

To stop sliding before it stops itself simple stop pressing the sneak button.要停止之前停止滑动本身简单的停止按潜行按钮。 



Feature: Faster Sprinting and Exhaustion 特点： 更快的短跑和疲惫 


This mod implements a faster, optional, configurable sprinting and exhaustion behaviour.这个mod实现更快，可​​选的，可配置的短跑和疲惫的行为。 It is merged with the standard minecraft sprinting and hunger behavior.这是合并的标准minecraft短跑和饥饿的行为。 

To sprint you have to move forward and click and hold the sprint button (default "TAB").要冲刺，你必须前进 ，单击并按住冲刺键（默认“选项卡”） 。 Sprinting is currently possible for walking , swimming diving , crawling , and climbing .短跑是目前可能的散步 ， 游泳跳水 ， 爬行和攀登 。 
Sprinting optionally causes exhaustion and will automatically end when a certain configurable threshold is reached.短跑可选原因用尽，并达到一定配置的阈值时会自动结束。 

To change this default sprint button visit Minecrafts "Options"/"Controls" menu.要改变这种默认的冲刺按钮访问Minecrafts“选项”/“控制”菜单。 



Feature: Crawling 特点： 爬行 


This mod implements an optional crawling movement to fit through 1x1 passages.这个mod实现了一个可选的爬行运动，通过1x1的通道，以适应。 

To crawl you have to press the grab and the sneak button.要抓取你必须按抓斗和潜行按钮。 When climbing would be possible at you current position and direction you might start climbing instead.爬坡时，将可能在你当前的位置和方向，你可能会开始登山，而不是。 To avoid this press the sneak button before the climb button to ensure to start crawling.为了避免这种按潜行按钮之前爬按钮，以确保开始爬行。 When crawling you can release the grab button.爬行时，您可以释放抢按钮。 

You can also free climb while crawling.也可以自由攀登 ，而爬行。 Just move to the related edge press grab and move forward towards it.只需将相关的边缘按抢迈向前进。 

Additionally you can free climb into a crawlable gap.另外，你可以免费爬入一个抓取的差距。 Just press sneak while you climb up and you will end up crawling in the first crawlable gap along your climb path.只需按下偷偷爬了起来，而你和你最终会在第一抓取差距沿攀登路径爬行 。 

Crawling can be made togglable via the configuration file. 爬行可以通过配置文件togglable。 When toggled on it can be toggled off by pressing the sneak button again to enter sneaking of by pressing the jump button to stand up immediately.当它切换，可以切换按潜行按钮再次进入按跳跃键，立即站起来，偷偷的。 



Feature: Configurability 功能： 可配置 


This mod changes the behaviour of its features depending on the content of the file "smart_moving_options.txt" in the ".minecraft" directory of your minecraft installation.这个mod改变其行为，根据“smart_moving_options.txt”“。minecraft”你的minecraft安装目录中的文件的内容。 

More information about the configuration of this mod is included in its readme and option files. 这个mod的配置的更多信息包含在其自述和选项文件。 

Previous option files like "smart_climbing_options.txt" and "smart_ladder_climbing_speed_options.txt" are still accepted but their content is eventually overridden by the content of existing more actual option files. 前面的选项文件，如“smart_climbing_options.txt和”smart_ladder_climbing_speed_options.txt仍然接受，但其内容是最终由现有更实际的选项文件的内容覆盖。 

If no option files are present at all, the default option values (all features, default configuration) will be used. 如果没有选项文件都存在，所有的默认选项值（所有功能，默认配置）将被使用。 
If an option is not present in the files, the corresponding default value will be used. 如果某个选项文件不存在，将使用相应的默认值 。 
The option "move.options.version" will be used for cross version compatibility. move.options.version“选项”，将用于跨版本兼容性。 

下载：



MC 1.1 - Smart Moving 6.6.zip
(606.84 KB, 下载次数: 1158)



2012-1-17 09:30 上传

replies.author: smx970114
replies.txt_content: 不错的东西，下载了
